title: How many octaves is C#1 to A5? - Quora

response.answer_text: C#1 C#2 - 1 octave C#3 - 2 octaves C#4 - 3 octaves C#5 - 4 octaves D5 - half step D#5 - whole step E5 - 3 semitones, or a minor 3rd F5 - 4 semitones, or a major 3rd F#5 - 5 semitones, or a perfect 4th G5 - 6 semitones, or a tritone G#5 - 7 semitones, or a perfect 5th A5 - 8 semitones, or a minor 6th Conclusion: C#1 to A5 covers a range of 4 octaves and a minor 6th
